snippet.title: Chef Wars - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Here's the latest trailer for Chef Wars! Available on the Apple Store and Google Play this October 2017!

Chef Wars is the first food discovery RPG! Help Sylvie recruit top chefs, source the best ingredients, and invent hundreds of recipes from around the world. Then use those recipes to win Iron Chef-styled kitchen battles. Become the most famous chef to fulfill her father's dying wish - to stop the evil Baron von Pork from world domination!

FOLLOW US!
Website: http://mindcakegames.com/
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/mindcakegames
Twitter: http://twitter.com/mindcakes
